assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Knowledge and skills that are necessary for self-managing and coping in modern higher education: goal-setting and planning of one's learning; critical evaluation and selection of references;  and learning both independently and in a group.
description.et:
Teadmised ja oskused enesejuhtimiseks ja hakkama saamiseks kaasaegses kõrghariduses: 
õppimise eesmärgistamine ja kavandamine, allikate kriitiline hindamine ja valimine, iseseisev ja rühmas 
õppimine.

objectives.en: To provide students with knowledge and skills that are necessary for self-managing and coping in modern higher education: goal-setting and planning of one's learning; critical evaluation and selection of references;  and learning both independently and in a group
objectives.et:
Anda üliõpilastele teadmisi ja oskusi, mis on vajalikud enesejuhtimiseks ja hakkamasaamiseks kaasaegses kõrghariduses: 
õppimise eesmärgistamine ja kavandamine, allikate kriitiline hindamine ja valimine, iseseisev ja rühmas 
õppimine.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion of the subject a student:
*	demonstrates self-management skills such as goal-setting and planning of one's learning;
learning_outcomes.et: *	demonstreerib selliseid enesejuhtimisoskusi nagu õppimise eesmärgistamine ja kavandamine;

learning_outcomes.en: *	can critically evaluate and select references;
learning_outcomes.et: *	oskab kriitiliselt hinnata ja valida allikaid;

learning_outcomes.en: *	applies different methods of independent and group learning.
learning_outcomes.et: *	kasutab erinevaid meetodeid õppimiseks iseseisvalt ja rühmas.
